job.title: Site Reliability Engineer // Azure // Remote
job.description:
A Software Development company that develops mobile threat defense software solutions is looking to bring on a talented Site Reliability Engineer. You'd be joining their Dallas-based team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives.
As an SRE, you'll be focused primarily on running better production application and systems, creating a strict engineering discipline, and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problems.
Carolyn Regimbal
